mapper.select: select r.reservation_date as startDate, r.reservation_id as id, d.doctor_name, p.name as patientName from reservation r join doctor d using(doctor_id) join patient p using(patient_id) where r.patient_id = #{patient_id} AND r.status != "CANCEL"

select ts.test_name as title, d.doctor_name, p.name as patientName, r.reservation_id as id, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(ts.test_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),' ', DATE_FORMAT(CAST(ts.test_time AS TIME), '%H:%i:%s')) AS startDate from test_reservation tr join patient p using(patient_id) join test_schedule ts using(schedule_id) join doctor d using(doctor_id) join reservation r using(reservation_id) where schedule_id = #{schedule_id} AND tr.status != "CANCELED"

select o.operation_name as title, d.doctor_name, p.name as patientName, o.operation_id as id, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(o.scheduled_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),' ', DATE_FORMAT(o.scheduled_time, '%H:%i:%s')) AS startDate from operation o join patient p using(patient_id) join doctor d using(doctor_id) where patient_id = #{patient_id} AND o.status != "CANCELED"
mapper.update: update reservation set status = "CANCEL" WHERE reservation_id = #{id} AND DATE(reservation_date) = DATE(#{date})
